title: Sugar Salad Recipe
description: Simply put, this is green leaf lettuce dressed with a mixture of vegetable oil, apple cider vinegar, and sugar.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Salad Green Salad Recipes Sugar Salad 4.2 (5) 5 Reviews 4 Photos Sweet and sour salad. Submitted by Suzie Published on June 18, 2020 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 4 4 4 Prep Time: 10 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 4 Yield: 4 servings Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings ¼ cup vegetable oil 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar 2 tablespoons white sugar 1 head green leaf lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces Directions Whisk the vegetable oil, vinegar, and sugar in a small bowl. Place the lettuce in a large bowl. Drizzle the oil mixture over the lettuce and toss to coat. I Made It Print Nutrition Facts (per serving) 157 Calories 14g Fat 8g Carbs 1g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 157 % Daily Value * Total Fat 14g 18% Saturated Fat 2g 11% Sodium 20mg 1% Total Carbohydrate 8g 3% Dietary Fiber 1g 3% Total Sugars 7g Protein 1g 2% Vitamin C 13mg 14% Calcium 26mg 2% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 141mg 3% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Add Your Photo Photos of Sugar Salad 01 of 04 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 04 Photo by  DL DD 03/04/2016 03 of 04 Photo by  5Foot3 01/17/2012 Simple and very good! Thanks for sharing! 04 of 04 Photo by  Jillian 01/10/2012 A very simple oil and vingegar mixture to liven up your mixed greens! I used olive oil vs. veg. oil and cut back on the sugar. I also added a little salt and cracked black pepper. I used a mix of romaine and butter lettuce to toss this with and this is a great base to add whatever veggies you like. 1 You’ll Also Love Easy and Quick Strawberry Summer Salad 5 Ratings Pear, Feta, and Lettuce Salad 17 Ratings Strawberry Onion Salad 37 Ratings James' Fire Salad 5 Ratings Refreshing Citrus Salad 1 Rating Arugula and Romaine Salad with Red Grapes 5 Ratings Wedge Salad on a Stick 20 Ratings Pear and Pomegranate Salad 75 Ratings The Really Good Salad Recipe with Pieces of Fruit 27 Ratings Quick Avocado Salad 2 Ratings Grilled Hearts of Romaine 49 Ratings Mandarin Almond Salad 256 Ratings Tri-Pepper Salad 16 Ratings Citrus Salad 6 Ratings Cornucopia Salad 54 Ratings Spicy Strawberry Salad 70 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Suzie
instructions: Whisk the vegetable oil, vinegar, and sugar in a small bowl. Place the lettuce in a large bowl. Drizzle the oil mixture over the lettuce and toss to coat.
